synopsis.text: Volume 15 of the manga brings with it a special OAD, adapting three captivating chapters from the original manga series. The first chapter showcases the blossoming romance between Shirayuki and Zen, as they embark on their first official date in the charming castle town. In addition, the OAD delves into the intriguing past of Prince Raji, offering a glimpse into his childhood. Lastly, the origin story of Zen, Mitsuhide, and Kiki's friendship is revealed, adding depth to their unbreakable bond. This 30-minute anime is not part of the ongoing television series and promises to be a delightful treat for fans of the manga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
